name: ACCT_GUAR_GROUPER
description: This table contains information about the requisition grouper patient and their relationship to the guarantor on the account.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: GROUPER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the requisition grouper patient associated with this account. This is legacy data that is no longer populated.

columns.name: GUAR_REL_TO_PAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The guarantor relationship to requisition grouper patient category ID for the account. This is legacy data that is no longer populated.
